metadata.titleEn: Multiple lines of evidence reveal a new species of Krait (Squamata, Elapidae, Bungarus)
metadata.titleCn: 多重证据揭示中国西南及缅甸北部剧毒环蛇属一新种
metadata.description: Kraits of the genus Bungarus Daudin 1803 are widely known venomous snakes distributed from Iran to China and Indonesia. Here, we use a combination of mitochondrial DNA sequence data and morphological data to describe a new species from Yingjiang County, Yunnan Province, China: Bungarus suzhenae sp. nov. Phylogenetically, this species forms a monophyletic lineage sister to the Bungarus candidus/multicinctus/wanghaotingi complex based on cyt b and ND4 genes but forms a ister species pair with the species B. magnimaculatus Wall & Evans, 1901 based on COI gene fragments. Morphologically, B. suzhenae sp. nov. is similar to the B. candidus/multicinctus/wanghaotingi complex but differs from these taxa by a combination of dental morphology, squamation, coloration pattern, as well as hemipenial morphology. A detailed description of the cranial osteology of the new species is given based on micro-CT tomography images. We revised the morphological characters of B. candidus/multicinctus/wanghaotingi complex and verified the validity of three species in this complex. The distribution of these species was revised; the records of B. candidus in China should be attributed to B. wanghaotingi. We also provide an updated key to species of Bungarus.
metadata.descriptionCn:
本数据为论文“多证据揭示中国西南及缅甸北部环蛇一新种”（英文标题为“Multiple lines of evidence reveal a new species of Krait (Squamata: Elapidae: Bungarus) from Southwestern China and Northern Myanmar ”）
插图原始分辨率版本及CT扫描头骨化石数据原始文件。
包含论文插图及正模式标本与副模式标本的头骨CT扫描三维重建图像堆栈原始文件。
metadata.instructions: 以文中出现的顺序及文件名称命名
metadata.instructionsCn:
公开发表的数据可直接下载，
可供署名版权引用

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the primary objectives of collecting CT scan data and high-resolution imagery for studying new species of Krait in Southwestern China and Northern Myanmar?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集CT扫描数据和高分辨率影像以研究中国西南部和缅甸北部新种眼镜蛇的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objectives include accurately reconstructing the skeletal structures to identify distinguishing features of the new Krait species, enhancing the understanding of its morphological characteristics, and providing detailed visual documentation for taxonomic classification and comparison with known species.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标包括准确重建骨骼结构，以识别新克雷特蛇物种的特征，增强对其形态特征的理解，并提供详细的视觉文档，以便进行分类和与已知物种的比较。
